info.title: Country Data API - Free
info.description:
Provides accurate country data, including codes, currencies, languages, flag images, emojis, random facts, and much more. 

**Additional Features:** 

 If you need any of the following features: 

* Commercial license
* All the facts for a country
* JSON Geo data
* 1001 or more requests per month

 Please take a look at the licensed version: 

<https://portal.thatapicompany.com/catalog/prd%5F5935z7x7rj9upjmm> 

**Example response:** 

